Summary: was watching fireworks with family when noticed a orange light fling towrds fireworks we cought on tape
divs: Sighting Detailson july 4 2011 about 10:30 me my fieance and 2 kids and cousin was watching the fireworks in muncie in. my fieance was recording the fireworks when i noticed a orange ball of light coming towards where the fireworks was going off i thought that was wierd seemed that would be very dangerous to fly so close to the fireworks the light seemed to pause just befor the spot where the fireworks was going off then seemed to fly through the spot where the fireworks was going off.i told my fiance to try and get the light on tape but when she looked at the little view screen on camera you couldnt see the light but we could see it with our eyes so we wasnt sure if we got it on tape or not.i was real busy the next day so i didnt get to review the sd card out of the camera but i was telling a buddy about what we saw and he thought i was crazy becouse there was couple hundred people there and we didnt hear of anybody else that saw it so i said lets review the sd card and see if we cought anything.when we watched the film i was stunned we did catch the orange light and what seems to me a ghostly face and a small flashing light that i didnt notice at first it seems to fly to the craft then comes out other side.i have my big screen tv as the monitor on my computer which seems to work better than a smaller screen you can see the face and the smaller light better than you can on a regular monitor screen.to be honest i wish we wouldnt have cought all this on camera it has bothered me and my family since i would love to have the video enhanced if i could i dont have the computer skills to do anything like that i posted the video on youtube but i have never done it befor and seems that i put in a bad spot but its there under sunp0051 you will see fireworks in little video screen was on page 6
